articles.description: SINGAPORE - Foreign worker Marimuthu S. never got to meet his 10-month-old daughter. When his wife gave birth to their second girl in India last April, Singapore was going through its circuit breaker period. The last time he had been back home was in August 2…
articles.title: 'He was the pillar of his family': Tuas fire victim never got to meet his 10-month-old daughter - AsiaOne
